English: Tang Bohu or Tang Yin `唐寅~ (1470-1523), Ming painter and poet, one of Four great southern talents of the Ming `江南~`四大~`才子~

d.f: `人名~。`指明~`文人~`唐寅~。`參見~「`唐寅~」`條~。
